title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-6.2 - Calibration of instruments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-6.2 - Calibration of instruments

State Regulations

Each person subject to this Part must ensure that
instruments and equipment used for quantitative radiation measurements (e.g., dose rate and effluent monitoring) are calibrated at least annually for the
radiation measured. Instruments used to measure effluent flow rates must also
be calibrated annually. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-6.2

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
